ai-kv5.8:1.3_0: They know what is rooted in the future, knows that it has caused its origin, its cessation, and the practice that leads to its cessation. And they know that which is the origin of nutriment knows that it comes to as its root.
ai-kv5.8:1.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.

ai-kv5.8:3.5_0: When a person has entered upon the fruit of stream-entry, he knowledge about the fruit of stream-entry.

ai-kv5.8:4.2_0: “It’s possible that a non-returner who regards the five grasping aggregates in this way will realize the fruit of non-return.” ...
